captions.text:
Welcome to Cook and Blend
the only cooking show that helps you to keep fit
without giving up the pleasures of the table.
And what could be better after Christmas' nosh-ups
than a nice shake, huh?
A chicken marinade and beer shake!

What do we need to make chicken marinade:
Chicken, cut into chunks, lemon

salt, pepper, vodka, tabasco if someone likes it spicy,
cherry tomatoes that we will use at the end

and a bag for food.
So we first take the bag and start filling it with chicken

which is what you should do yourself, fill your belly
with chicken to fill up your muscles.
Take it coarsely, and put the chiken in the bag
add salt and pepper
according to what you like... abundant is good!

Oil, carefully, lemon: this technique consist
in taking the lemons and squeeze them together.

Lemon is good!
Then vodka
if someone likes it spicy, add tabasco, just a tiny little squirt.
Now the chicken should marinate for 6 hours, but first

we make sure that we massage the meat
with all the ingredients for good.

In all the cooking shows they do what?
You have got to wait 40 minutes, 1 hour or 2 hours?
They have everything already done.

Not me!
I still remember what my master told me that day...
but wouldn't it be better if we have one just done already?
So I'm gonna take it: I open the fridge, pull it out and say
hey look we just had it already done, huh?
NO!
We of Cook & Blend will actually wait for six hours that the chicken marinade is done!

Well, 6 hours passed and our chicken is ready.
Now we can start the operation.
Let's start heating the pan
now that the pan is hot we can cook our chicken marinated. Go!
Now wait the 16-17 hours that the chicken needs to cook
Flavours, scents, we can perceive the snow of Russia where the vodka was made.
Good... very good!
Now you can add the tomatoes... not those!
I cant wait to taste it blended with the beer.

This will help you to lose weight, to get back
in shape after you stuffed yourself up
like an Etruscan wildboar during the holiday season.

While chicken is cooking, I would suggest to try
the beer which we're going to blend together...
It is very good!
Chicken is ready.

What a masterpiece.
This is our chicken marinade.

I got shivers in my spine!
Do not blend it all, keep the rest for later. Not to eat. Just to blend later.
When you blend, you blend it a bit a time.

Pour the beer, let some foam get out,
you don't want to risk an explosion when you start blending.
I think it's right.
And now, let's blend!
You stop, slow down, contemplate, accelerate...
Stop!
The taste is smooth, delicious!
A great meal. Lunch or dinner as you wish.

You would say, why preparing such a
complex dish like chicken marinade with tomatoes
and then blend everything with beer?
Do you know why?

Because blended is better
Cook and blend!
The chiken is great, and blender is even better

If you enjoyed this video, subscribe the channel,
follow us on facebook, follow us on twitter

share the video. Link it to your friends, cousins,
relatives, uncles and grandchildren

to all of them!
And send us your videos with your own shakes!
And suck my di...
